title: Tokusou Kihei Dorvack
alternative_title: Special Powered Armor Troop Dorvack,  Dolbuk, Dolbuck, 特装機兵ドルバック
description: When aliens invade Earth, Triple Command, led by fearless Masato Mugen, is placed in charge of defense. Masato is aided by Frenchman Pierre Bonaparte and Japanese-American girl Loui Oberon.
